attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app took forEVERRRR to download and when it finally did, my phone was super slow and it used up all my data!! Also the app itself is just really stupid and I don’t see the point of it. If I could give it 0 stars, I would!

attributes.title: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: I initially thought getting this app would be a great way to support my non-racist president whom treats women with the upmost respect, but the app turned out to be extremely disappointing! I put my faith in this app and it failed me! My only hope is that the next app will be better :)

attributes.title: WORST APP DO NOT GET😤🤬
attributes.review: This is the worst app I downloaded and it scammed me for all my money and I didn’t even purchase anything please I’m warning ⚠️ you if you get this app you will regret it instantly if there was negative reviews I would of already did it I REPEAT😤😤 don’t get this appppp ‼️‼️‼️

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE.
attributes.review: i don’t usually write reviews like this, but this is serious and needs to be addressed immediately. this app is the worst possible app you could get. they hacked my iphone and had access through all my info through this HORRIBLE app. DONT USE. APPLE DELETE THIS APP NOW.

attributes.title: This app gave me a virus and lice😿👹🦠
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app my head👩‍🦲 began to itch🧜‍♀️ non-stop❌ and I got a notification saying “the baby 🍼 is a 👧 ” I didn’t know I was 🤰 , because of this app not only will I have to buy a new 📱 and lice 🧴 but I’ll also have to get an abortion🔪👶🏻

attributes.title: this isn’t his onlyfans??
attributes.review: hello gamers! i downloaded this app to see our fav non misogynistic non homophobic non xenophobic non racist non transphobic potus. let’s j say i had high expectations. i open the app to immediately be requested for my phone number. excuse me sir, i am in a committed relationship and the age gap is a little much for me. it’s not rlly the appropriate time to ask for my number. anyways i couldn’t make it past that part so like and comment for a part two. make sure to subscribe to my channel.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: I downloaded the app as usual and was quite happy with it until it started glitching and lagging. It even made all of my social media lag as well and I couldn’t take it anymore. Don’t get this ridiculous app.

attributes.title: Horrible.
attributes.review: Just trying to get more perspective but this app take weeks to download. I started having weird dreams after downloading this... would not recommend.. my dog turned ORANGE and started growing blonde toupeeish type hair... deleted the app right away.

attributes.title: Something ain’t right
attributes.review: I don’t think this is actual trump app.  It was reviewing my Facebook and other social media apps.  My phone has been going slow every since I installed this app.   This must be a liberal attempt to mess with trump

attributes.title: SAD!
attributes.review: all I wanted was to support my king but instead when I opened the app my eyes immediately fell out of my head in horror, I contracted stage 7 chlamydia diarrhea, and my brains turned to battery acid. in a panic I went to tiktok to bully libtards and feminazis but instead my disease consisting of racism homophobia and sexism was cured. SAD!
